LanguageData.AerocraftFramework_Trade_Leave_Desc: The 'Content' inside the Aerocraft will temporarily leave the Aerocraft and generate a Caravan, allowing for trade and non combat missions
LanguageData.AerocraftFramework_TradeError: Error: No colonizers inside the Aerocraft's 'Content'
LanguageData.AerocraftFramework_Refuel_Desc: Retrieve fuel that meets the requirements from the 'Content' into the Aerocraft to fill the Aerocraft with fuel
LanguageData.AerocraftFramework_Refuel_Message_A: Unable to fill: The fuel in the Aerocraft is already full
LanguageData.AerocraftFramework_Refuel_Message_B: Error: Could not find suitable fuel to fill in the 'Content'
